fields.description:
CLI: Running 'titanium setup -a' , error comes after prompt 'path to ndk', object has no method trim.

Actual:
Path to the Android NDK: (this is needed for building native Titainum Modules for Android) (/home/global_user/Downloads/android-ndk-r8d) 

/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/index.js:111
      throw e;
            ^
TypeError: Object true has no method 'trim'
    at exports.run (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/setup.js:316:42)
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at exports.run (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/setup.js:315:25)
    at prompt.get (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/prompt/lib/prompt.js:317:32)
    at async.forEachSeries.iterate (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:116:25)
    at assembler (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/prompt/lib/prompt.js:314:9)
    at prompt.get (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/prompt/lib/prompt.js:323:32)
    at prompt.getInput (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/prompt/lib/prompt.js:598:5)
    at Interface.onLine (/usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/prompt/node_modules/read/lib/read.js:110:5)
